summary: This is a brief email forwarding the Daily Assignments for an Associate Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, sent on August 10, 2019. It appears to be routine administrative communication from the Bureau of Prisons.

locations.description: Address of the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York

keyFacts: Document is an email dated August 10, 2019, forwarding Daily Assignments for an Associate Warden at MCC New York.
The email originates from or references the Bureau of Prisons (bop.gov) domain.
The Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York at 150 Park Row is the facility referenced.
No specific individuals are named in the provided text excerpt.
The document appears to be routine administrative correspondence rather than case-specific evidence.
